availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Married to Minerva Hildreth. Father of Francis M. Hildreth, James M Hildreth, Sarah C Hildreth, Elvira A Hildreth, Alphonso Hildreth, John D Hildreth, and Minerva Hildreth. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, District No. 1, p. 338A;
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 742.
